message.content:
cs.CY, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DB

The paper discusses software platforms for Smart Cities, which involves the integration of various technologies such as Cyber-Physical Systems, Internet of Things, Big Data, and Cloud Computing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CY (Computer Science - Computers and Society), which deals with the intersection of computer science and social issues. The paper also discusses the use of ICT in Smart Cities, which falls under cs.NI (Computer Science - Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper discusses functional and non-functional requirements, which are related to software engineering and could fall under cs.SE (Computer Science - Software Engineering). The paper also mentions the use of Big Data, which could fall under cs.DB (Computer Science - Databases). Finally, the paper discusses challenges in the development of Smart City software platforms, which could fall under cs.DC (Computer Science - Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
